01-Jan-2025
Daily Series
Finance
1. Which organization signed two crucial loans with the Government of India to support infrastructure and sustainable growth?
(A) World Bank
(B) International Monetary Fund
(C) Asian Development Bank
(D) New Development Bank
Ans: C
Finance
2. Which country will host the inaugural World Audio Visual Entertainment Summit (WAVES) in February 2025?
(A) India
(B) Switzerland
(C) United States
(D) Japan
Ans: A
Finance
3. Which country, along with India, has completed two years of the Economic Cooperation and Trade Agreement (ECTA), aiming to reach AUD 100 billion in trade by 2030?
(A) United States
(B) United Kingdom
(C) Canada
(D) Australia
Ans: D
Finance
4. Who has been appointed as the new CEO of DBS Bank India effective March 1, 2025?
(A) Surojit Shome
(B) Piyush Gupta
(C) Rajat Verma
(D) Anand Kumar
Ans: C
Finance
5. Who has been appointed as the officiating Director General of the CRPF?
(A) Anish Dayal Singh
(B) Vitul Kumar
(C) Sanjay Arora
(D) Deepak Mishra
Ans: B
Finance
6. Who served as India’s 13th Prime Minister and played a pivotal role in the economic reforms of 1991?
(A) P. V. Narasimha Rao
(B) Indira Gandhi
(C) Atal Bihari Vajpayee
(D) Dr. Manmohan Singh
Ans: D
Finance
7. Which organization has been re-certified as a ‘Great Place to Work’ for January 2025 to January 2026?
(A) Tata Steel
(B) Hindustan Zinc
(C) SAIL
(D) JSW Steel
Ans: C
Finance
8. By what percentage has e-waste generation increased in India over the past five years?
(A) 65.12%
(B) 72.54%
(C) 57.48%
(D) 82.31%
Ans: B
Finance
9. Which country shares a 1,643 km largely unfenced border with Arunachal Pradesh, Nagaland, Manipur, and Mizoram?
(A) Myanmar
(B) Bangladesh
(C) China
(D) Bhutan
Ans: A
Finance
10. Who won three National titles in the final round of the MMSC FMSCI Indian National Motorcycle Drag Racing Championship, extending their record to 15 titles?
(A) Hemanth Muddappa
(B) Rajiv Sethu
(C) Jagan Kumar
(D) Hari Krishnan
Ans: A
Finance
11. What is the record value of India's defence exports achieved over the past decade?
(A) Rs 2,000 Crore
(B) Rs 10,000 Crore
(C) Rs 15,000 Crore
(D) Rs 21,000 Crore
Ans: D
Finance
12. By what date must banks implement the name lookup facility for NEFT and RTGS transactions?
(A) January 1, 2025
(B) April 1, 2025
(C) June 30, 2025
(D) January 31, 2025
Ans: B
02-Jan-2025
Daily Series
International
1. Which country launched the 'Child Marriage Free' campaign to end child marriage?
(A) India
(B) Bangladesh
(C) Bhutan
(D) Nepal
Ans: D
International
2. Who has been appointed as the new Secretary General of ASSOCHAM?
(A) Deepak Sood
(B) Ramesh Agarwal
(C) Manish Singhal
(D) Vijay Singh
Ans: C
International
3. Who shared the 2024 World Blitz Chess Championship title?
(A) Magnus Carlsen and Ju Wenjun
(B) Magnus Carlsen and Ian Nepomniachtchi
(C) Ian Nepomniachtchi and Ju Wenjun
(D) Magnus Carlsen and Lei Tingjie
Ans: B
International
4. On which date is Global Family Day celebrated annually?
(A) January 1
(B) December 25
(C) February 14
(D) October 10
Ans: A
International
5. What has the Defence Ministry designated 2025 as?
(A) Year of Innovation
(B) Year of Modernization
(C) Year of Reforms
(D) Year of Integration
Ans: C
International
6. Which Indian state has unveiled the country's first glass sea bridge?
(A) Tamil Nadu
(B) Kerala
(C) Karnataka
(D) Andhra Pradesh
Ans: A
International
7. Which country introduced a 1% tourist tax on lodging costs to support tourism infrastructure starting in 2025?
(A) France
(B) Germany
(C) Russia
(D) Italy
Ans: C
International
8. Which state won the Santosh Trophy by defeating Kerala 1-0 in the final?
(A) West Bengal
(B) Gujarat
(C) Punjab
(D) Tamil Nadu
Ans: A
International
9. Who recently assumed charge as the CEO of UIDAI?
(A) Rajesh Kumar
(B) Pankaj Singh
(C) Anil Sharma
(D) Bhuvnesh Kumar
Ans: D
International
10. What type of planet is K2-18 b considered to be?
(A) Terrestrial
(B) Hycean
(C) Kepler
(D) Draugr
Ans: B
International
11. Who recently assumed command of the IAF’s Western Air Command?
(A) Air Marshal Jeetendra Mishra
(B) Air Marshal Pankaj Mohan Sinha
(C) Air Marshal Arjun Singh
(D) Air Marshal Vikram Chauhan
Ans: A
International
12. Which country is enforcing a ban on facial coverings and implementing pension increases starting January 1, 2025?
(A) France
(B) Austria
(C) Germany
(D) Switzerland
Ans: D
International
13. What is the percentage year-on-year increase in India's installed renewable energy capacity in 2024?
(A) 10%
(B) 14%
(C) 18%
(D) 20%
Ans: B
03-Jan-2025
Daily Series
State
1. Which state has set a target to add 20,000 MW of renewable energy capacity by 2030?
(A) Telangana
(B) Karnataka
(C) Gujarat
(D) Maharashtra
Ans: A
State
2. In which city has Blinkit launched its 10-minute ambulance service?
(A) Gurugram
(B) Bangalore
(C) Mumbai
(D) Hyderabad
Ans: A
State
3. Which country is currently experiencing an overwhelming outbreak of Human metapneumovirus (HMPV)?
(A) Thailand
(B) Japan
(C) South Korea
(D) China
Ans: D
State
4. By how much did the total annual groundwater recharge increase in 2024?
(A) 10 BCM
(B) 15 BCM
(C) 20 BCM
(D) 25 BCM
Ans: B
State
5. Which country’s satellite is ISRO launching to enable direct smartphone voice calls?
(A) Canada
(B) United Kingdom
(C) United States
(D) Australia
Ans: C
State
6. Which city is home to Mubadala, the leading global sovereign investor in 2024?
(A) Dubai
(B) Abu Dhabi
(C) Riyadh
(D) Doha
Ans: B
State
7. In which state was the "Mahabharat Vatika" set up for plant conservation?
(A) Madhya Pradesh
(B) Rajasthan
(C) Himachal Pradesh
(D) Uttarakhand
Ans: D
State
8. Which institution partnered with the Ministry of Agriculture to launch Project VISTAAR?
(A) IIM Ahmedabad
(B) NIT Trichy
(C) IIT Madras
(D) IISc Bengaluru
Ans: C
State
9. On which date will the first Lokpal Day be celebrated in 2025?
(A) January 16
(B) January 12
(C) January 4
(D) January 9
Ans: A
State
10. Which bank has launched a TAB-based digital onboarding process for NRIs to open NRE and NRO accounts?
(A) ICICI Bank
(B) SBI
(C) HDFC Bank
(D) Axis Bank
Ans: B
State
11. Where was the 'Pujari Granthi Samman' scheme launched?
(A) New Delhi
(B) Mumbai
(C) Kolkata
(D) Chennai
Ans: A
State
12. Which state implemented the Healthy Homework Act effective January 1, 2025?
(A) Texas
(B) New York
(C) California
(D) Florida
Ans: C
State
13. Who has been sworn in as the 42nd Governor of Bihar?
(A) Rajendra Vishwanath Arlekar
(B) Arif Mohammad Khan
(C) K. Vinod Chandran
(D) Nitish Kumar
Ans: B
State
14. In which year was the Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) founded?
(A) 1947
(B) 1965
(C) 1971
(D) 1958
Ans: D
04-Jan-2025
Daily Series
National
1. What is the primary focus of Grameen Bharat Mahotsav 2025?
(A) Urban development
(B) Rural empowerment
(C) Industrial growth
(D) Technological innovation
Ans: B
National

(A) Air Vice Marshal Manmeet Singh
(B) Air Vice Marshal Rajeev Sharma
(C) Air Vice Marshal Anil Chaturvedi
(D) Air Vice Marshal Rohit Kapoor
Ans: A
National
3. Which institution developed bacteria capable of combating soil pollution?
(A) IISc Bangalore
(B) IIT Bombay
(C) IIT Delhi
(D) NIT Trichy
Ans: B
National

(A) Rajiv Kumar
(B) Anil Kumar Jha
(C) Ashutosh Agnihotri
(D) Sanjay Malhotra
Ans: C
National

(A) Vikram Dev Dutt
(B) Akash Tripathi
(C) Rajesh Kumar
(D) Faiz Ahmed Kidwai
Ans: D
National
6. On which date is World Braille Day celebrated annually?
(A) December 3
(B) February 15
(C) January 4
(D) April 23
Ans: C
National
7. Who was the first female teacher in India and a pioneer of India's feminist movement?
(A) Savitribai Phule
(B) Rani Lakshmibai
(C) Sarojini Naidu
(D) Kasturba Gandhi
Ans: A
National

(A) HDFC Bank
(B) ICICI Bank
(C) SBI
(D) Axis Bank
Ans: C
National

(A) Andhra Pradesh
(B) Karnataka
(C) Telangana
(D) Tamil Nadu
Ans: A
National

(A) ICICI Prudential Life
(B) HDFC Life
(C) SBI Life
(D) Axis Max Life
Ans: D
National

(A) 4.09%
(B) 4.86%
(C) 13.7%
(D) 25.7%
Ans: B
05-Jan-2025
Daily Series
Technology
1. Which institution collaborated with the Bose Institute, Kolkata, to develop an advanced injectable hydrogel for localized cancer treatment?
(A) AIIMS Delhi
(B) IIT-Madras
(C) IISc Bangalore
(D) IIT-Guwahati
Ans: D
Technology
2. Which Indian state has become the first to adopt the Green GDP model, integrating the economic value of its forest ecosystem services into financial planning?
(A) Kerala
(B) Chhattisgarh
(C) Maharashtra
(D) Madhya Pradesh
Ans: B
Technology
3. What is Nomura’s revised GDP growth forecast for India in FY25?
(A) 7.5%
(B) 6.9%
(C) 6.5%
(D) 6.7%
Ans: D
Technology
4. Which Indian state faces significant human trafficking challenges, particularly in the Sundarbans region, due to socio-environmental vulnerabilities?
(A) Odisha
(B) Bihar
(C) West Bengal
(D) Assam
Ans: C
Technology
5. What is the below-age group most affected by the recent surge in Human Metapneumovirus (HMPV) cases reported in China?
(A) 14 years
(B) 20 years
(C) 30 years
(D) 70 years
Ans: A
Technology
6. What percentage of its stake in Unity Small Finance Bank does BharatPe plan to sell?
(A) 25%
(B) 49%
(C) 10%
(D) 77%
Ans: A
Technology
7. Which location recently witnessed protests over the disposal of toxic waste from the Union Carbide factory?
(A) Indore
(B) Pithampur
(C) Bhopal
(D) Gwalior
Ans: B
Technology
8. Which Indian state has expanded the Rythu Bharosa scheme to provide ₹7,500 per acre to farmers starting January 2025?
(A) Karnataka
(B) Andhra Pradesh
(C) Telangana
(D) Tamil Nadu
Ans: C
Technology
9. Which Indian state recorded an elephant population of 5,828 in the 2024 Elephant Population Estimate?
(A) Assam
(B) Karnataka
(C) Kerala
(D) Tamil Nadu
Ans: A
Technology
10. Which bank is merging with National Co-operative Bank as approved by the RBI?
(A) Maratha Sahakari Bank
(B) Cosmos Co-operative Bank
(C) Sahebrao Deshmukh Sahakari Bank
(D) Karnataka Bank
Ans: B

Daily Series
National

(D) Chennai

(B) West Bengal
(C) Punjab
(D) Maharashtra

(A) 3rd
(B) 2nd
(C) 4th
(D) 1st
Ans: A

(A) DRDO
(B) ICMR
(C) CSIR
(D) ISRO
Ans: C
National

(A) Hanoi
(B) Beijing
(C) New Delhi
(D) Jakarta
Ans: A
National

(A) Kerala
(B) Tamil Nadu
(C) Maharashtra
(D) Karnataka

(A) Jharkhand
(B) Odisha
(C) Chhattisgarh
(D) Madhya Pradesh

(B) Mumbai
(C) Bengaluru
(D) Hyderabad

(A) China
(B) Russia
(C) United States
(D) India
Ans: C

(A) Haryana
(B) Punjab
(C) Himachal Pradesh
(D) Uttarakhand

(A) ICICI Bank
(B) Axis Bank
(C) HDFC Bank
(D) SBI
Ans: C
National

(A) Mumbai-Pune
(B) Hyderabad-Warangal
(C) Delhi-Meerut
(D) Chennai-Bengaluru

National

(A) December 25
(B) January 5
(C) February 14
(D) March 21

(A) 4%
(B) 5%
(C) 6%
(D) 7%
Ans: B

(A) Colombia
(B) Peru
(C) Venezuela
(D) Ecuador
Ans: D

(B) Second

(D) Fourth

(B) San Diego
(C) Sacramento
(D) Los Angeles

(C) Uttarakhand

(B) Canada
(C) Australia
(D) United Kingdom

7. What is India’s ranking in the 2025 Henley Passport Index?

(B) 80th

(D) 34%
Ans: D
Awards and Honours
3. In which states will India launch a scientific study to assess zoonotic spillover risks?
(A) Kerala, Rajasthan, and Gujarat
(B) Sikkim, Maharashtra, and Tamil Nadu
(C) Uttar Pradesh, Andhra Pradesh, and Punjab
(D) West Bengal, Bihar, and Karnataka
Ans: B
Awards and Honours

(B) Myanmar
(C) Sri Lanka
(D) Bangladesh
Ans: D

(D) BARC

Daily Series
Environment

(C) Ozone

(B) Denmark

(D) 2013

(B) 1971

(D) 1958

(B) Nepal
(C) Bhutan
(D) Tibet
Ans: B

(B) To perform a geostationary orbit manoeuvre
(C) To follow a polar orbit over both the North and South Poles
(D) To test satellite deployment systems
Ans: C
Environment

(B) To measure temperatures in the moon’s south pole
(C) To collect lunar rock samples for return missions
(D) To test communication systems for future lunar bases

(D) AIIMS Patna

(C) 8.9%
(D) 5%
Ans: B
State

(D) INS Shardul

Daily Series
Economy
1. By what percentage did India’s external debt increase to reach $736.3 billion by March 2025?
(A) 10%
(B) 8.5%
(C) 12%
(D) 7%
Ans: A
Economy
2. On which highway has India’s first dedicated wildlife corridor been constructed?
(A) Golden Quadrilateral
(B) Delhi-Mumbai Highway
(C) Chennai-Bangalore Expressway
(D) Mumbai-Pune Expressway
Ans: B
Economy
3. Who has been granted an extension to serve as the Chairman of the Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) till June 2026?
(A) Ravi Agrawal
(B) Nitin Gupta
(C) Sanjay Malhotra
(D) Vivek Johri
Ans: A
Economy
4. Which institutions in India are set to adopt UPI-enabled QR code payments nationwide by August 2025?
(A) Cooperative Banks
(B) Government Hospitals
(C) Post Offices
(D) Railway Stations
Ans: C
Economy
5. Which Indian company became the first to surpass 15 GW of installed renewable energy capacity?
(A) Tata Power
(B) ReNew Power
(C) NTPC Green Energy
(D) Adani Green
Ans: D
Economy
6. Which bank recently saw the resignation of both its MD & CEO and Executive Director?
(A) South Indian Bank
(B) Karnataka Bank
(C) Federal Bank
(D) Dhanlaxmi Bank
Ans: B
Economy
7. On which date is International Asteroid Day observed annually?
(A) July 1
(B) June 10
(C) June 30
(D) July 30
Ans: C
Economy
8. Which company developed the AI model AlphaGenome?
(A) Google
(B) Microsoft
(C) Amazon
(D) Facebook
Ans: A
Economy
9. Where was the headquarters of the newly established Turmeric Board inaugurated in June 2025?
(A) Warangal
(B) Vijayawada
(C) Hyderabad
(D) Nizamabad
Ans: D
Economy
10. From which country has India restricted jute imports through most ports?
(A) Nepal
(B) Bangladesh
(C) Myanmar
(D) Thailand
Ans: B
01-Jul-2025
Daily Series
International
1. What is the revised tax rate on foreign remittances according to the new draft of the One Big Beautiful Bill Act in the U.S. Senate?
(A) 2%
(B) 1%
(C) 5%
(D) 3%
Ans: B
International
2. What percentage of India’s GDP did the external debt constitute at the end of March 2025?
(A) 19.1%
(B) 18.5%
(C) 21.3%
(D) 17.8%
Ans: A
International
3. In which Indian state has Reliance Defence and Coastal Mechanics launched a new Defence MRO hub?
(A) Gujarat
(B) Karnataka
(C) Maharashtra
(D) Telangana
Ans: C
International
4. Which region hosted India’s first-ever Astro Tourism Festival to promote scientific tourism?
(A) Sikkim
(B) Himachal Pradesh
(C) Ladakh
(D) Arunachal Pradesh
Ans: C
International
5. On which date is National Chartered Accountants Day observed in India?
(A) January 26
(B) July 1
(C) August 29
(D) October 1
Ans: B
International
6. Which multilateral group launched the first-ever ‘At Sea Observer Mission’ to enhance maritime security?
(A) ASEAN
(B) SAARC
(C) NATO
(D) QUAD
Ans: D
International
7. Which country hosted the first-ever ASEAN–India Cruise Dialogue on July 1, 2025?
(A) Thailand
(B) India
(C) Indonesia
(D) Malaysia
Ans: B
International
8. On which date is National Doctors' Day observed in India?
(A) August 15
(B) January 26
(C) July 1
(D) October 2
Ans: C
International
9. Who has been appointed as the new Commandant of MILIT, Pune, as of June 30, 2025?
(A) Rear Admiral V Ganapathy
(B) Vice Admiral S. Menon
(C) Air Marshal R.K. Sharma
(D) Lt Gen A.K. Bhatt
Ans: A
International
10. Under which Article of the Indian Constitution was the GST Council established?
(A) Article 279A
(B) Article 370
(C) Article 246A
(D) Article 368
Ans: A
International
11. Which country has launched the Synthetic Human Genome Project (SynHG)?
(A) United States
(B) Germany
(C) Canada
(D) United Kingdom
Ans: D

Daily Series
State

(A) Kerala
(B) Tamil Nadu
(C) Karnataka
(D) Andhra Pradesh

(B) Kolkata
(C) Mumbai
(D) Sevastopol

State

(A) INS Shivalik
(B) INS Nilgiri
(C) INS Udaygiri
(D) INS Satpura

State

(A) Teghbir Singh
(B) Arjun Vajpai
(C) Shivangi Pathak
(D) Krushnaa Patil

State

(A) Raghuram Rajan
(B) K. VijayRaghavan
(C) Arvind Subramanian
(D) Nandan Nilekani
Ans: D
State

(A) TrainConnect App
(B) RailOne App
(C) BharatRail App
(D) IRCTC Plus App
Ans: B
State
7. What is a key area of emphasis in the Employment Linked Incentive (ELI) Scheme?
(A) Expansion of Rural Banking Services
(B) Focus on the Manufacturing Sector
(C) Promotion of Tourism and Heritage Sites
(D) Development of Smart Cities
Ans: B
State

(A) Rajesh Verma
(B) Anil Kumar Sharma
(C) Kesavan Ramachandran
(D) Vikas Mehta
Ans: C
State

(A) June 30
(B) July 1
(C) June 29
(D) July 2
Ans: D
State

(A) 2nd
(B) 1st
(C) 3rd
(D) 4th
Ans: A
State

(A) Saudi Arabia
(B) Japan
(C) Germany
(D) UAE
Ans: D
State

(A) Mumbai
(B) Bengaluru
(C) New Delhi
(D) Hyderabad
Ans: C

Awards and Honours

(A) Michael Ferreira
(B) Anjali Bhagwat
(C) Ravi Shastri
(D) Joaquim Carvalho

(A) Coimbatore
(B) Tiruppur
(C) Erode
(D) Virudhunagar
Ans: D
Awards and Honours

(A) Maharashtra
(B) Gujarat
(C) Rajasthan
(D) Madhya Pradesh
Ans: B
Awards and Honours

(A) Kenya
(B) Spain
(C) Nigeria
(D) Ghana
Ans: D
Awards and Honours

(A) SWARAJ
(B) HYDRO-INDIA
(C) C-FLOOD
(D) JAL-SHIELD
Ans: C
Awards and Honours

(A) Sri Lanka
(B) Bangladesh
(C) Nepal
(D) Maldives
Ans: A
Awards and Honours

(A) Gurugram
(B) Pune
(C) Bengaluru
(D) Ahmedabad
Ans: A
Awards and Honours

(A) Bhopal
(B) Ahmedabad
(C) Pune
(D) Indore
Ans: D
Awards and Honours

(A) Airtel
(B) T-Mobile
(C) Jio
(D) Verizon
Ans: C
Awards and Honours
10. Which Indian state launched the 'Mukhya Mantri Pratigya' scheme to support youths with paid internships after completing their class 12 board exams?
(A) Bihar
(B) Uttar Pradesh
(C) Maharashtra
(D) Gujarat
Ans: A
Awards and Honours
11. Which organisation launched the SPREE 2025 scheme to expand social security coverage and simplify registration for unregistered employers and workers?
(A) Ministry of Corporate Affairs
(B) Employees' State Insurance Corporation
(C) Central Board of Direct Taxes
(D) National Skill Development Corporation
Ans: B
Awards and Honours

(A) Paytm
(B) Slice
(C) PhonePe
(D) Razorpay
Ans: B

(C) ICICI Bank

Daily Series
State
1. Which state government signed an MoU with Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders Limited (MDL) for developing a world-class shipyard on India’s eastern coast?
(A) Tamil Nadu
(B) Andhra Pradesh
(C) Odisha
(D) West Bengal
Ans: A
State
2. Which state government launched the ₹1,000 crore LEAP (Local Economy Accelerator Programme) to promote innovation and job creation outside its capital city?
(A) Maharashtra
(B) Karnataka
(C) Telangana
(D) Gujarat
Ans: B
State
3. In which city was the 28th National Conference on e-Governance 2025 held, where a key declaration on India’s digital transformation was adopted?
(A) Visakhapatnam
(B) Hyderabad
(C) Bengaluru
(D) New Delhi
Ans: A
State
4. Who has recently assumed charge as the Controller General of Communication Accounts (CGCA) under the Ministry of Communications?
(A) Anuradha Singh
(B) Vandana Gupta
(C) Ritu Sharma
(D) Neha Verma
Ans: B
State
5. Who chaired the 49th meeting of PRAGATI on 24 September 2025 to review ₹65,000 crore worth of infrastructure projects?
(A) Amit Shah
(B) Rajnath Singh
(C) Narendra Modi
(D) Nirmala Sitharaman
Ans: C
State
6. On which date is World Pharmacists Day observed each year to honour pharmacists' contributions to public health and medical safety?
(A) September 20
(B) September 22
(C) September 25
(D) September 30
Ans: C
State
7. Where will World Food India 2025 be held from September 25–28?
(A) Mumbai
(B) Bengaluru
(C) Hyderabad
(D) New Delhi
Ans: D
State
8. Which quick-commerce platform partnered with the Ministry of Labour and Employment to create 10,000 jobs via the NCS Portal?
(A) Blinkit
(B) Swiggy Instamart
(C) BigBasket
(D) Zepto
Ans: D
State
9. Which country’s business council signed MoUs with Indian partners to deepen trade ties and strengthen the CEPA framework?
(A) Saudi Arabia
(B) UAE
(C) Singapore
(D) Qatar
Ans: B
State
10. Which Indian shipyard signed an MoU with HD Korea Shipbuilding & Offshore Engineering to enhance maritime capabilities?
(A) Cochin Shipyard Limited
(B) Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders Limited
(C) Garden Reach Shipbuilders & Engineers
(D) Hindustan Shipyard Limited
Ans: A

Daily Series
National

(A) Mumbai Port
(B) Kolkata Port

National

(B) Washington D.C.
(C) New York
(D) Singapore
Ans: C

(A) Qatar
(B) United Arab Emirates
(C) Singapore
(D) France
Ans: A
National

(A) September 26
(B) October 16
(C) March 22
(D) July 5
Ans: A
National

(A) Canada
(B) Australia
(C) United Kingdom
(D) New Zealand
Ans: B
National

(A) Mumbai
(B) Ahmedabad
(C) New Delhi
(D) Bengaluru
Ans: B
National

(A) Dubai
(B) Abu Dhabi
(C) Riyadh
(D) Doha
Ans: A
National

(A) October 1
(B) September 26
(C) November 12
(D) August 15
Ans: B
National

(A) Uttar Pradesh
(B) Rajasthan
(C) Madhya Pradesh
(D) Bihar
Ans: D

(A) IIT Bombay
(B) IISc Bangalore
(C) IIIT Hyderabad
(D) IIT Madras
Ans: D
National

(A) Prithvi Missile
(B) Shaurya Missile
(C) Agni Prime Missile
(D) BrahMos Missile
Ans: C

(D) December 10

(B) UAE
(C) Qatar
(D) Oman

(B) Dr. Meera Nair
(C) Dr. Kanad Das
(D) Dr. Arvind Menon
Ans: C
Places

(A) USA, Canada, and Mexico
(B) Spain, Portugal, and Morocco
(C) Argentina, Uruguay, and Chile
(D) Germany, France, and Italy
Ans: A
Places

(A) Uttar Pradesh
(B) Bihar
(C) Madhya Pradesh
(D) Rajasthan
Ans: A
Places

(A) Iran
(B) Greece
(C) Egypt
(D) Turkey
Ans: D
Places

(A) Kerala
(B) Tamil Nadu
(C) Andhra Pradesh
(D) Karnataka
Ans: B

(A) China
(B) Brazil
(C) South Africa
(D) Russia
Ans: D

Daily Series
Awards and Honours
1. Who won the 2025 Krishi Media Award for outstanding contributions to agricultural journalism and farmer awareness?
(A) Shivam Reddy
(B) Harinikumar Hombale
(C) Ramesh Chandra
(D) Amshi Prasannakumar
Ans: D
Awards and Honours

(A) Lionel Messi
(B) Andres Iniesta
(C) Sergio Busquets
(D) Xavi Hernandez
Ans: C
Awards and Honours

(A) 148%
(B) 58%
(C) 39%
(D) 80%
Ans: A
Awards and Honours

(A) 109th
(B) 99th
(C) 87th
(D) 105th
Ans: B
Awards and Honours

(A) Mumbai
(B) New Delhi
(C) Bengaluru
(D) Chennai
Ans: B
Awards and Honours
6. What regulatory action did the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) take against Datta Finance and Trading Pvt Ltd due to violations in digital lending operations?
(A) NBFC Licence
(B) Banking Licence
(C) SEBI Registration
(D) GST Registration
Ans: A
Awards and Honours

(A) Promoting higher education in urban areas
(B) Expanding industrial infrastructure
(C) Enhancing international collaborations
(D) Strengthening innovation at the school level
Ans: D
Awards and Honours

(A) Mumbai
(B) New Delhi
(C) Bengaluru
(D) Chennai
Ans: B
Awards and Honours

(A) Bihar
(B) Uttar Pradesh
(C) West Bengal
(D) Jharkhand
Ans: A
Awards and Honours

(A) Sukhoi Su-30MKI
(B) Tejas LCA
(C) MiG-21
(D) Jaguar
Ans: C

(C) Andaman Islands

(C) Bhubaneswar
(D) Lucknow

(B) Sri Lanka
(C) Pakistan

(A) Himachal Pradesh
(B) Uttarakhand
(C) Jammu & Kashmir
(D) Sikkim

(B) Gujarat
(C) Maharashtra
(D) Karnataka

(B) Mithun Manhas
(C) Rajeev Shukla
(D) Sourav Ganguly

06-Oct-2025
Daily Series
Awards and Honours
1. Who were awarded the 2025 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine for their discoveries on peripheral immune tolerance?
(A) Mary E. Brunkow, Fred Ramsdell, and Shimon Sakaguchi
(B) James Allison and Tasuku Honjo
(C) Emmanuelle Charpentier and Jennifer Doudna
(D) Michael Rosbash, Michael Young, and Jeffrey Hall
Ans: A
Awards and Honours

(B) Visakhapatnam
(C) Chennai
(D) Kochi
Ans: C

(C) DRDO
(D) Bharat Electronics Limited

Ans: A

(C) Ahmedabad
(D) Glasgow
Ans: C

(A) Aryaman Finance Ltd
(B) Aryaman Capital Services Ltd
(C) Aryaman Merchant Bank Ltd
(D) Aryaman Investment Advisors Ltd
Ans: A
International
5. At which location was the successful maiden flight test of the Pinaka LRGR-120 rocket conducted?
(A) Pokhran
(B) Balasore
(C) Chandipur
(D) Sriharikota
Ans: C
International
6. Which Indian state launched the ‘e-Swasthya Samvad’ digital platform to enhance transparency and coordination in medical education?
(A) Rajasthan
(B) Gujarat
(C) Madhya Pradesh
(D) Uttar Pradesh
Ans: A
International
7. Which country launched the live-fire military drills code-named “Justice Mission 2025” around Taiwan?
(A) United States
(B) Japan
(C) China
(D) South Korea
Ans: C
International
8. Who became the first painter to receive the 2025 Most Achieved Chinese Award (MACA)?
(A) Ai Weiwei
(B) Zhang Damo
(C) Xu Beihong
(D) Fan Zeng
Ans: B
International
9. In which Indian state was the first-ever camera-trap sighting of a Clouded Leopard in Kakoi Reserve Forest recorded?
(A) Arunachal Pradesh
(B) Meghalaya
(C) Nagaland
(D) Assam
Ans: D
International
10. Which provision of the Indian Constitution is violated when civilian awards like Bharat Ratna or Padma awards are used as prefixes or suffixes to a person’s name?
(A) Article 14
(B) Article 18(1)
(C) Article 19
(D) Article 21
Ans: B
31-Dec-2025
Daily Series
Sports
1. Which Indian cricketer became the second from the country and the fourth woman globally to score 10,000 international runs in women’s cricket?
(A) Mithali Raj
(B) Harmanpreet Kaur
(C) Smriti Mandhana
(D) Jhulan Goswami
Ans: C
Sports
2. What was the growth rate of India’s Index of Industrial Production (IIP) in November 2025, marking a 25-month high?
(A) 6.7%
(B) 5.2%
(C) 7.4%
(D) 11.9%
Ans: A
Sports
3. In which city will the Indian AI Research Organization (IAIRO) be established from January 2026?
(A) Ahmedabad
(B) Surat
(C) Vadodara
(D) Gandhinagar
Ans: D
Sports
4. Which senior IPS officer has been given the additional charge of Director General of the National Investigation Agency (NIA) by the Ministry of Home Affairs?
(A) Sadanand Date
(B) Rakesh Aggarwal
(C) Praveen Sinha
(D) Alok Mittal
Ans: B
Sports
5. What is the designation of the Pinaka variant that was successfully tested by DRDO with a maximum range of 120 km?
(A) Pinaka Mk-II
(B) LRGR-120
(C) Prahaar
(D) Agni-P
Ans: B
Sports
6. Which country announced that former US President Donald Trump will receive its highest civilian honour in the newly created Peace category in 2026?
(A) Ukraine
(B) Israel
(C) United Kingdom
(D) France
Ans: B
Sports
7. Which institution is partnering with the Delhi government to develop the AI-based Intelligent Grievance Monitoring System (IGMS)?
(A) IIT Kanpur
(B) IIT Delhi
(C) IIT Bombay
(D) IIT Madras
Ans: A
Sports
8. In which city was the world’s first administration of the ITVISMA gene therapy for spinal muscular atrophy carried out?
(A) Abu Dhabi
(B) Dubai
(C) New York
(D) Geneva
Ans: A
Sports
9. Which bird sanctuary in Uttar Pradesh has been declared an Eco-Sensitive Zone to enhance biodiversity conservation and promote responsible ecotourism?
(A) Okhla Bird Sanctuary
(B) Nawabganj Bird Sanctuary
(C) Sandi Bird Sanctuary
(D) Parvati Arga Bird Sanctuary
Ans: D
Sports
10. Which country was overtaken by India to become the world’s fourth-largest economy in 2025?
(A) Germany
(B) United Kingdom
(C) Japan
(D) France
Ans: C
